en.para1: LungA offers a range of international events for the entire duration of the festival – they are all open and free of charge, unless specifically stated otherwise.
en.tba: The exhibitions Excercise, House of Van Helzing, Stored Void and Living Exhibition are open every day 11–16 July.

is.para1: LungA býður upp á háklassa alþjóðlega viðburði yfir alla vikuna. Viðburðir eru ókeypis og aðgengilegir öllum nema annað sé sérstaklega tekið fram.
is.tba: Sýningarnar Excercise, House of Van Helzing, Stored Void & Lifandi sýning eru opnar alla daga 11.–16. júlí.
